name: RN/CNA Job Application Lead Capture
description: Automated web form submission workflow that captures RN and CNA job applications, stores data in Google Sheets, and sends instant notifications to recruiters via email and Slack
useCase: Healthcare staffing agencies need to capture RN and CNA job applications from their website forms and immediately notify recruiters. This workflow automates the entire lead capture process - from form submission to database storage to multi-channel notifications.

external: Google Sheet with 'Candidates' tab and columns: Name, Email, Phone, Position, License Number, License State, Years Experience, Specialty, Preferred Location, Shift Preference, Application Date, Status
Web form that POSTs to n8n webhook URL
environment: SHEET_URL - Direct URL to your Google Sheet

author: Caphe Workflows
features: Automatic data extraction from POST body
Slack channel notifications with candidate details
limitations: Requires Google Sheets for data storage (not CRM-integrated)
No automatic email confirmation to applicant
No duplicate detection (same applicant can submit multiple times)

pricing.smtp: Varies by provider (Gmail free for basic use)
